posts.post_content:
Prices are shipped and insured (within the US) and assume a no-fee payment method.  I have to collect sales tax from WA state buyers.

Bender Portrait EPDG PSA 2.5 $1300 SOLD
Eddie Collins EPDG PSA 2 $1500
Beckley Cycle 350 SGC 1.  $450 SOLD
Bender no trees with cool blue shift and extra wide borders PSA 2 (cracked holder) $500
Hi Luke, nice cards. I just picked up 3 BL in the UK, 2 of which are 460 backs. Not the best condition but you know how rare they are.
I will take the EPDG Bender. PM sent. Thanks
Luke, really great selection, good luck!
How’s everything going, I’ll take the Beckley Cycle 350, thanks
